REQUIRED BEFORE START OF INSTALLATION N/A Done When Plan 01 Plan 02 Plan 03 Plan 04
C1 Lift Shaft ,Pit ,Over Head / M/C Room Structure Completed As Per GAD
C2 Pit Finished To Required Depth As Per GAD
C3 Waterproofing of Pit Completed
C4 Hoisting Beams / Hooks Of Adequate Capacity As Per GAD
C5 Door Lintel On Every Floor ENTRANCE Provided As Per GAD
C6 Front Entrance Walls Provided On All Floors as per GAD
C7 Smoke Vent in Over Head Area Provided ( Min Size 450mm*450mm )
C8 Door Opening Full Width Available On Lowest Floor.
C9 FFL Marking in Front Of Lift Entrance Provided in all Floors.
C10 Plastering In Lift Shaft at all floors Completed
C11 White Washing / Painting Completed in Lift Shaft on All Floors.
C12 Lockable Store Room available Near Lift Shaft (Approx 30 Sq M/Per Lift )
C13 Clean & Dry Pit & Lift Well Available (VERY CRITICAL)
C14 Safe , Clear & unobstructed access to Lift Shaft & M/C Room Available
C15 suitable Notch in Sill fixing area of Landing Door available as per GAD
C16 Scaffolding & Safety Barricading Fixed In Lift Shaft As Per GAD
C17 Cut Out For LOP Provided On Front Wall of All Floor as per GAD
C18 Steel Beams ( Machine Support Beams ) available at Top Floor.
C19 Marking for Cutouts for Beams Provided in walls in OH area
C20 Cutouts in walls in Over Head area for Beams Provided
 
 
E1 Permanent Working Lights (Bulkhead Fitting) in Lift Shaft Provided
E2 Single Ph Power Switch / Socket Provided at all floors for Hammer Drill M/c
E3 Earthing Provided On Steel Scaffolding
REQUIRED BEFORE START OF INSTALLATION (WITH MACHINE ROOM) N/A Done When Plan 01 Plan 02 Plan 03 Plan 04
C21 Rope Cutouts Provided In Floor Slab of Machine Room
C22 Safe Staircase , Door , Lighting , Exhaust-Fan Provided in M/C Room
C23 Plastering of Walls & Roof Completed in Machine Room
C24 White Washing / Painting Completed in Machine Room
REQUIRED BEFORE START OF INSTALLATION (WITH MACHINE ROOM) N/A Done When Plan 01 Plan 02 Plan 03 Plan 04
C25 Cladding / Architraves provided on All Lift Door Entrances
C26 Buffer Block ( RCC ) Provided in Lift Pit as per GAD
C27 FINAL Finish / WW/Washing / Painting Completed in Lift Shaft / M/C Room
C28 Pit Ladder Provided in Lift Pit ( Required where Pit Depth ≥ 1350 mm )
E4 3 Phase Power + Double Earthing + MCB + RCCB Provided As Per GAD
E5 Exhaust Fan Provided In Lift Well or M/C Room
E6 Earthing Bracket Provided Near Lift Controller
E7 Double Earthing Terminated On Earthing Bracket (VERY CRITICAL)
E8 Fire Extinguishing Provided near Lift Controller
E9 Danger Plate (440 V) Provided on Controller
E10 Earth Striping Working in Lift Shaft
E11 Smoke Vent Window Same Vent In Lift Shaft
E12 Louvers Provided on Exhaust Fan
name: Customer Scope of Work
